thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Travelport Worldwide Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.37

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Travelport Worldwide Reports Q4 EPS Of $0.37
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Travelport Worldwide Ltd:
* TRAVELPORT WORLDWIDE LIMITED REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* ‍$18 MILLION DECREASE IN PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IN Q4 DUE TO RECENT TAX REFORM ​
* SEES ‍ FY 2018 FREE CASH FLOW $ 210 MILLION - $ 230 MILLION ​
* QTRLY NET REVENUE $573.6 MILLION VERSUS $545.4 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NET REVENUE $2,535 MILLION - $2,585 MILLION
* SEES ‍FY 2018 ADJUSTED INCOME PER SHARE - DILUTED $ 1.34 - $ 1.46​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23, REVENUE VIEW $566.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.44, REVENUE VIEW $2.53 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $2.53 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.35 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.37 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
